participant_1.background:
I love to experiment with different colors and styles, and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself through my clothing.
i love to swim.
my favorite band is the beatles.
I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia.
I was recently bedridden for a week, so I had to eat a lot of soft foods that were easy to digest.

participant_2.background:
I'm at a healthy weight.
My family and friends are my favorite people because they are always there for me, no matter what.
I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow.
i m hoping to find someone to marry me.
I don't dye my hair, because I like my natural color.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hello! My day is going well, thank you for asking.  How is your day going?
My day is going great! I just got back from a week-long vacation in Russia.
Wow, that sounds like an amazing vacation!  What was your favorite part?
My favorite part was meeting the creators of my favorite comic book series.  They were so nice and down to earth.
That sounds like an amazing experience! I'm glad you had a great time.
Thanks!  I'm glad to be back home, but I'm already looking forward to my next vacation.
Where are you thinking of going next?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going somewhere warm.  How about you?  Are you planning any upcoming trips?
I'm not planning any trips right now, but I'm hoping to go somewhere tropical this summer.
That sounds like a great idea!  I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time.
Thanks!  I'm looking forward to it.
